summary: The customer was considering downgrading their service and the agent provided them with three options: Basic, Plus, and Premium. The Basic plan includes unlimited talk and text plus 500 MB of data for $29.99 per month; the Plus plan includes unlimited talk and text plus 1GB of data for $39.99 per month; and the Premium plan includes unlimited talk and text plus 2GB of data for $49.99 per month. The customer was satisfied with this information and the agent offered assistance should they have any other questions or concerns.
